text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Tavtimanovsky Selsoviet, Iglinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 143 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 26 km from Iglino, 8 km from Tavtimanovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Iglinsky District
title: Pokrovka, Iglinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
